MonsterTrait.Name: Immutable Form
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork myrmidon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork myrmidon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork myrmidon makes two attacks: two pick attacks or two slam attacks, or one of each.

MonsterAction.Name: Heavy Pick
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Alchemical Flame Jet (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork myrmidon can spew a jet of alchemical fire in a line 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Any creature in the path of the jet takes 26 (4d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

MonsterTrait.Name: Grease Spray (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, the clockwork myrmidon's chest can fire a spray of alchemical grease with a range of 30 feet, covering a 10-by-10 foot square area and turning it into difficult terrain. Each creature standing in the affected area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

MonsterTrait.Name: Alchemical Fireball
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork myrmidon's alchemical flame reservoir explodes when the construct is destroyed, spraying nearby creatures with burning fuel. A creature within 5 feet of the myrmidon takes 19 (3d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. This explosion doesn't occur if the clockwork myrmidon has already fired its alchemical flame jet four times.
